Thank you for visiting FontMagic.com and downloading (Ananda font) designed by (Billy Argel).

Font url: https://www.fontmagic.com/ananda.font

FontMagic.com is a repository of fonts and dingbats. In addition to our original creations, the site has beautiful hand-picked fonts from highly talented font designers and foundries.


We are grateful to (Billy Argel) for sharing their work. Please do drop them an email or visit their website (http://www.billyargel.com/).
